Megan

Introduction

Megan Meiyok Skiendiel is a Chinese-American dancer, rapper, singer, model, and actress under Geffen Records and HYBE Labels. She is best known as a member of the global girl group KATSEYE.

Megan is recognized for her participation in the survival show "The Debut: Dream Academy", where she ranked 5th and qualified for debut, becoming a member of the girl group KATSEYE.

On August 16, 2024, Megan officially debuted as a member of KATSEYE with their first EP "SIS (SOFT IS STRONG)".
